title: manasi dussaham (mp)
sahitya:
manasi dussaham ayyO madanakadanamendu madirAkSi jnyAn ceyyAvu


anupallavi

  panimatimukhai bAlE padmanAbhaninnennil kanavillAikalAl kAman pArameyyunnu


caraNam 1    lOka vAsigaLkellAm lObhanIyanAmindu shOkamekkumAtram  sumukhi tarunnadendu 
EkAntattilennoDu sAkam ceida lIlagaL akavE mama kAntanA shubhada marannO
    caraNam 2    innuvarumen kAntanennavu dinavum jnyAn dhanyEharudi ninaccu tAndayAyi maruvunnuU  
anna pAnADiyilu mannanaDayALamE nannAyi vimukhatayum nArI ratnamEvannu
    caraNam 3    bAnatrayattAl tannE pAriDangaL munnumE kSINamAkki ceyyunna shrI pancavishikham 
nILAnAyi valayummE niravadhi shucam nalkAn EnamizhivaiSamyam endupara ka tOzhi
